Bootstrap Elements - CSS & JScript

WONDER is a theme based in Twitter Bootstrap 2.2.2 version. This page contains examples of many bootstrap tools and editing styles. Please, refer to the official website if you need more information.

12 Column: Responsive Grid Layout
The responsive Bootstrap grid system utilizes 12 columns. The grid adapts to be 724px and 1170px wide depending on your viewport. Below 767px viewports, the columns become fluid and stack vertically.
